overview:
Michael co-founded Netbiscuits and serves the company as CEO since 2000. He is one of the first true Mobile Internet pioneers in Germany and today one of the most experienced individuals in the mobile market and a valued industry voice as speaker. He is overall responsible for the Netbiscuits Strategy as well as Sales and Marketing and successfully grew the business to a market leading software company serving 300+ business customers and major brands such as eBay, Yahoo and AOL.

Michael started his professional career working for an large UK based company where he was head of IT in Germany and project manager for international software projects in Germany, UK, Spain, Switzerland and Sweden. Michael is an active member in mobile market shaping organizations such as Mobile Monday, MMA, CTIA, MEF and inMobile. Michael holds a Master’s Degree in Business and Engineering of the University of Kaiserslautern. He was nominated for the prestigious Entrepreneur of the Year Award in Germany in 2008

Netbiscuits enables you to develop, publish and monetize cross-platform mobile sites and apps.
